content: stitches stripe row 3 with color a k3 kfb knit to end 1 stitch next row k2 k2tog ssk k2 2 stitches decreased 6 increased 123 stitches stitches stripe row 4 with color a k3 kfb knit to end 1 stitch next row k1 k2tog ssk k1 2 stitches decreased 4 increased 124 stitches stitches next row k1 k2tog k1 1 stitch decreased 3 stitches repeat stripe row 1-4 five times total 140 stitches bind off remaining stitches cut color a continue with color b until you have 160 stitches or until finishing you have used 50% of the weight of your lightest skein weave in ends and block gently next row k3 ssk knit to end 1 stitch decreased 159 stitches © helen cosgrove-davies 2019 page 2 of 3 magic number blanket yarn miss babs yowza mini trio 100% superwash merino wool three 200 yd/2 8 oz 182 m/80 g skeins 1 set shown in fiddlehead color a tuscan sun color b and nori color c or approximately 200 yds 182 m of each of three contrasting colors of dk weight yarn finished measurements abbreviations 22 /55cm square k knit needles kfb knit into the front and back of the stitch 1 stitch us size 6 4 0 mm circular needle or size to obtain increased gauge k2tog knit 2 stitches together 1 stitch decreased gauge ssk slip two stitches one at a time as if to knit 21 stitches and 42 row = 4 /10 cm in garter stitch insert left hand needle into the front of these two stitches and knit them together from this position 1 gauge is not crucial for this project but will affect stitch decreased yardage and finished size if different from above notions tapestry needle © helen cosgrove-davies 2019
